TopicTitle: Can't select anything in map screen during flight.

Articles.Content:
KSP Version 1.12.5

Problem: When in map mode I sometimes can't select anything on the map like planets/moons, craft, nodes, can't create or select maneuvre nodes. This seems to happen randomly. I can select things in the UI like the nav ball, SAS, switching to maneuvre mode etc. I can go to the tracking station and go to a different craft, and it still happens. The only cure is closing down the game and restarting. 

Mods installed: PreciseManeuver 2.4.99.1

Logs etc:

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/149zsn3ei4503cw9lhiwm/h?rlkey=r5u4y0v2f2p73hzbkihscycg7&dl=0
